message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
Let's flip the script. I think 60-40 is a good deal, but for me this time!
I'll give you a bit more, but 60-40 is still too much for you!
Let's split the difference this time. I'm willing to give you a little more, but I think 55-45 is a fair compromise.
Getting closer, but I still want the bigger share
Let's be reasonable. With the inflation hitting us both, I think a 50-50 split is the fairest way to go.  This way, we both get a good share and we can avoid the risk of getting nothing at all.
